name: Zombie Trek Driver Survival
description:
NOW ON SALE!!!

Speed, Fear & Zombies!!!

Can you handle the fear? Are you able to drive at night, avoiding the zombies and globular lightning ?

Surviving is not easy, you can stay in the dark surrounded by zombies that will tear you into pieces if you do not keep charging the battery of your vehicle. To keep the lights on you will need to collect the batteries that you find along the way, but avoid the obstacles.

The obstacles make you blind, run the battery down and make you go so fast you completely lose control.

Remember: Battery = 0 = dark = death.

Features:
The music follows the speed of the game, creating tension

Game initially simple, but if mistakes are maid the speed becomes uncontrollable
